welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content: # Weeby-JS Official JavaScript API Wrapper for [Weeby API](https://weebyapi.xyz/). [![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/weeby-js.png)](https://nodei.co/npm/weeby-js/) ## ‚≠êÔ∏è Features - Super simple and easy to use - Built in documentation - Includes all methods from Weeby API - Object-Oriented - Beginner friendly - Support for TypeScript ## üíæ Installation ```bash npm install weeby-js --save ``` ## üóù Authentication `weeby-js` requires an authorization token which can be obtained by doing one of the following methods: - Joining the [NTM Central Discord Server](https://weebyapi.xyz/discord), and then running the `/apply` command with the Weeby API bot. - Logging into the [Dashboard](https://weebyapi.xyz/dashboard) and then using the [application form](https://weebyapi.xyz/dashboard/apply) and filling in the required fields. To learn more in deep about the application process, please visit the [Getting Started](https://weebyapi.xyz/gettingstarted) page. > Upon being accepted into Weeby API. It is very important to **never** show this token to anybody. ## üè≥ Examples ### GIF: ```js const WeebyAPI = require('weeby-js'); const weeby = new WeebyAPI('YOUR_TOKEN'); let gif = await weeby.gif.fetch('pat'); console.log(gif); // -> https://cdn.weebyapi.xyz/img/gif/pat/13.gif ``` ### Generator: ```js const WeebyAPI = require('weeby-js'); const weeby = new WeebyAPI('YOUR_TOKEN'); let image = await weeby.generators.oneImage({ type: '3000years', image: 'https://i.imgur.com/ZgrxPgU.png' }); message.channel.send({files: [{ attachment: image }]}); // -> Image Buffer ``` ### Lyrics: ```js const WeebyAPI = require('weeby-js'); const weeby = new WeebyAPI('YOUR_TOKEN'); let lyrics = await weeby.generators.lyrics('Thriller'); message.channel.send(lyrics.track.name); // -> Object ``` More Examples can be found in `/test/bot-v12.js`. > NOTE: Bot Example is outdated and is strongly discouraged from production use. ## ‚å®Ô∏è Functions > Note: You must use `await` on all functions, or else you will get errors. > Also The functions documented here will be temporary unless I find a developer who is capable of documenting these better. :) ### Generators ([View](https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators)) ```js // One Image await weeby.generators.oneImage({ type: String, image: String }); // Two Images await weeby.generators.twoImages({ type: String, firstImage: String, secondImage: String }); // Text await weeby.generators.text({ type: String, text: String }); // Two Text await weeby.generators.twoText({ type: String, textOne: String, textTwo: String }); // Image and Text await weeby.generators.textImage({ type: String, image: String, text: String }); // Eject await weeby.generators.eject({ image: String, text: String, outcome: String }); // Friendship await weeby.generators.friendship({ firstImage: String, secondImage: String, firstText: String, secondText: String }); // Demotivational await weeby.generators.demotivational({ image: String, title: String, text: String }); // RIP await weeby.generators.rip({ avatar: String, username: String, message: String }); // Tweet await weeby.generators.tweet({ avatar: String, username: String, tweet: String }); // Tweet Fetch (using Twitter API) await weeby.generators.tweetFetch({ username: String, tweet: String }); // Spotify Now Playing await weeby.generators.spotifyNp({ image: String, songName: String, artist: String, userPicks: String }); // Triggered await weeby.generators.triggered({ image: String }); // Currency await weeby.generators.currency({ type: String, amount: Number }); // Color await weeby.generators.color(String); ``` ### Custom ([View](https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#section2)) ```js // Greeting await weeby.custom.greeting(options: Object); // Booster await weeby.custom.booster(options: Object); // Rank await weeby.custom.rank(options: Object); // Level Up await weeby.custom.levelUp(options: Object); ``` ### GIF ([View](https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#gif)) ```js await weeby.gif.fetch(String); ``` ### JSON ([View](https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#json)) ```js // Random Word await weeby.json.word(String); // Formatted Text await weeby.json.textFormat({ type: String, text: String }); // Response await weeby.json.response(String); // Lyrics await weeby.json.lyrics(String); // Weeby API Statistics await weeby.json.stats(); ``` ### Effects ([View](https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#effects)) ```js // General await weeby.json.general({ type: String, image: String }); // Intensity await weeby.json.intensity({ type: String, intensity: Number, image: String }); // Level await weeby.json.level({ type: String, level: Number, image: String }); // Resize Image await weeby.json.resize({ width: Number, height: Number, image: String }); ``` ### Overlays ([View](https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#overlays)) ```js await weeby.overlays.fetch({ type: String, image: String }); ``` ## üëãüèª Support If you have found an issue while using this wrapper or have any suggestions? Feel free to join the [NTM Discord Server](https://weebyapi.xyz/discord), send an [issue](https://github.com/ntm-development/weeby-js/issues/new) or [pull request](https://github.com/ntm-development/weeby-js/pulls). We'll be happy to help and take a look! ## ‚ù§Ô∏è Thanks! Thanks for checking out `weeby-js`, a NPM module development and maintained by NTM Development. I am currently maintaining this during my spare time, so if you would like to support me, Feel free to do so by donating [here](https://buymeacoffee.com/ntmnathan) on Buy me a coffee. Also, don't forget to star the repo! üòã ## ‚öñÔ∏è License The `GNU General Public License v3.0` applies to this repository. Please see the `LICENSE` file to learn more.

construct.name: Client
construct.description: Weeby-JS - The official JavaScript wrapper for Weeby API, developed by NTM Development. Click [here](https://weebyapi.xyz/) for the website.

params.name: token
params.description: Your Weeby API Token. Get this by applying through the Weeby API bot on the [Discord Server](https://discord.com/invite/G2rb53z), or through the [Dashboard Application Page](https://weebyapi.xyz/dashboard/apply).

props.name: baseURL
props.description: The base URL of the API.

props.name: baseURL
props.description: The base URL of the API

methods.name: greeting
methods.description: Creates a customisable greeting image with Icon, Name, Greet and Background. Optional parameters can let you customise the color of each element, or let you add a message.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.icon
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.background
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif) (1024x470 recommended)

params.name: options.name
params.description: The name of the greeted user.

params.name: options.greet
params.description: What should the user be greeted with?

params.name: options.message
params.description: Provide a message on the bottom of the user's name.

params.name: options.greetHex
params.description: The color of the greet text. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.nameHex
params.description: The color of the name text. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.circleHex
params.description: The color of the avatar border. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.messageHex
params.description: The color of the message text. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.font
params.description: The font to use, 'gotham' by default.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: booster
methods.description: Creates a customisable booster add/remove image with Icon, Name and Background. Optional queries can let you customise the color of each element.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.icon
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.background
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif) (1024x470 recommended)

params.name: options.name
params.description: The name of the user who boosted the server.

params.name: options.title
params.description: The title of the booster card.

params.name: options.message
params.description: Provide a message on the bottom of title.

params.name: options.titleHex
params.description: The color of the title text. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.nameHex
params.description: The color of the name text. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.circleHex
params.description: The color of the avatar border. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.messageHex
params.description: The color of the message text. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.font
params.description: The font to use, 'nexa' by default.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: rank
methods.description: Creates a customisable rank card with Icon, Name, and leveling stats.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.avatar
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.username
params.description: The username to print.

params.name: options.bgColor
params.description: The color of the background.

params.name: options.level
params.description: The Level the user is currently on.

params.name: options.xp
params.description: How much XP the user has.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: levelUp
methods.description: Creates a customisable level up card.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.avatar
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.bgColor
params.description: The color of the background. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.borderColor
params.description: The color of the avatar border. (Do not include the hashtag).

params.name: options.oldlevel
params.description: The old level of the user.

params.name: options.newlevel
params.description: The new level of the user.

params.name: options.font
params.description: The font to use, 'nexa' by default.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

props.name: baseURL
props.description: The base URL of the API

methods.name: general
methods.description: Applies an effect to the provided image. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#effects for the available effects.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The Type of Effect to use.

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: intensity
methods.description: Applies an effect to the provided image that can change the level. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#effects for the available effects.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The Type of Effect to use.

params.name: options.intensity
params.description: The intensity of the effect.

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: level
methods.description: Applies an effect to the provided image that can change the level. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#effects for the available effects.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The Type of Effect to use.

params.name: options.level
params.description: The level of the effect.

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: resize
methods.description: Resizes a provided image.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.width
params.description: The width of the resized image. (1-2000)

params.name: options.height
params.description: The height of the resized image. (1-2000)

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

props.name: baseURL
props.description: The base URL of the API

methods.name: oneImage
methods.description: Draws one image on a requested image generator. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The Type of Generator.

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: twoImages
methods.description: Draws two images on a requested image generator. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The Type of Generator.

params.name: options.firstImage
params.description: The link to the first image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.secondImage
params.description: The link to the second image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: text
methods.description: Prints text on a requested image generator. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The Type of Generator.

params.name: options.text
params.description: The text to print.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: twoText
methods.description: Prints two texts on a requested image generator. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The Type of Generator.

params.name: options.textOne
params.description: The first text to print.

params.name: options.textTwo
params.description: The second text to print.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: textImage
methods.description: Draws an image and text on a requested generator. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The type of Generator

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.text
params.description: The text to print.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: eject
methods.description: Draws one image and one text on a Among Us Generator.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.text
params.description: The text to print.

params.name: options.outcome
params.description: The type of outcome to display in the text.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: friendship
methods.description: Prints two images and texts on a friendship banner. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.firstImage
params.description: The link to the first image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.secondImage
params.description: The link to the second image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.firstText
params.description: The first text to print.

params.name: options.secondText
params.description: The second text to print.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: demotivational
methods.description: Draws an image, title and text on a demotivational poster. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.title
params.description: The title text to print.

params.name: options.text
params.description: The text to print.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: rip
methods.description: Draws a image, username and message on a Gravestone. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.avatar
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.username
params.description: The username to print.

params.name: options.message
params.description: The text to print.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: tweet
methods.description: Generates a raw twitter tweet with username, tweet text and avatar. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.username
params.description: The username to print.

params.name: options.tweet
params.description: The text to print.

params.name: options.avatar
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: tweetFetch
methods.description: Generates a twitter tweet with username (fetched from the Twitter API) and the tweet text. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.username
params.description: The username to print.

params.name: options.tweet
params.description: The text to print.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: spotifyNp
methods.description: Generates a Fake Spotify Now Playing Image. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.songName
params.description: The name of the song to print.

params.name: options.artist
params.description: The artist name to print.

params.name: options.userPicks
params.description: The user's picks name to print.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: triggered
methods.description: Draws one image on an animated triggered GIF.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

params.name: options.tint
params.description: Whether the generated GIF should have a orange tint. Defaults to True.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: currency
methods.description: Generates a image with the specified currency and its amount.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The type of currency.

params.name: options.amount
params.description: The amount of money to display.

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Returns the colour in a Image (Buffer) format. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#generators for the available generators.

params.name: hex
params.description: The hex color (Do not include the hashtag).

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

props.name: baseURL
props.description: The base URL of the API

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Returns a random GIF image of the type provided.

params.name: type
params.description: The Type of GIF. See https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#gif for all the GIFs.

returns.description: The Formatted GIF URL.

props.name: baseURL
props.description: The base URL of the API

methods.name: word
methods.description: Returns a random word. (list endpoint not supported)

params.name: type
params.description: The Type of JSON response to request. See https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#json for all the JSON endpoints.

returns.description: The response in a string.

methods.name: response
methods.description: Returns a random response.

params.name: type
params.description: The Type of JSON response to request. See https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#json for all the JSON endpoints.

returns.description: The response in a string.

methods.name: meme
methods.description: Returns a random SFW Meme from a Subreddit.

params.name: category
params.description: The name of the category.

returns.description: The returned JSON object.

methods.name: textFormat
methods.description: Formats the provided text into a different style.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The type of text formatter.

params.name: options.text
params.description: The text to format.

returns.description: The response in a string.

methods.name: lyrics
methods.description: Fetches lyrics from the Genius API.

params.name: query
params.description: The lyrics to search. See https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#json for all the JSON endpoints.

returns.description: The lyrics and its information.

methods.name: stats
methods.description: Fetches Weeby API's current statistics.

returns.description: The statistics returned in a object.

props.name: baseURL
props.description: The base URL of the API

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Draws one image on a requested image overlay. Please see https://weebyapi.xyz/api/docs#overlays for the available overlays.

params.name: options
params.description: The options that contain the required parameters.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The Type of Overlay.

params.name: options.image
params.description: The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)

returns.description: The generated image in a buffer.

props.name: colors.songArtPrimary
props.description: The primary color of the song art.

props.name: colors.songArtSecondary
props.description: The secondary color of the song art.

props.name: colors.songArtText
props.description: The text color of the song art.

props.name: album.recordingLocation
props.description: The recording location of the song/album.

props.name: album.releaseDate
props.description: The release date of the song.

props.name: album.formattedReleaseDate
props.description: The formatted version of the release date.

props.name: url
props.description: The image URL of the post.

props.name: permaURL
props.description: The URL of of the post.

props.name: date
props.description: The date the post was created.

props.name: score
props.description: The number of scores the post earned.

props.name: comments
props.description: The number of comments on the post.

props.name: awards
props.description: The number of awards given on the post.
